starvationevasion.common

Interface PolicyProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Fall2015PolicyProvider

    public interface PolicyProvider
    The PolicyProvider interface is implemented by any class that provides policy cards to the simulator. Created by peter on 11/17/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getPolicyCount

        int getPolicyCount()
        Returns:
        The total number of policies in the game.

        The collection of cards provided by the implementing class.

      • createPolicy

        Policy createPolicy(PolicyCard card,
                    EnumRegion region)
        Creates a new policy card instance for the playing card and region.
        Parameters:
        card - A playing card provided by this policy provider.
        region - The region playing the card.
        Returns:
        A policy card for the specified policy..

      • getPolicyName

        java.lang.String getPolicyName(PolicyCard card)
        Maps a playing card to a policy name.
        Parameters:
        card - The class for which the policy number is required.
        Returns:
        The policy number for the class.
